summary: App/projeto HEIFIX para assistência técnica de celulares (serviço de diagnóstico e reparo), incluindo catálogo de serviços com preço e descrição.
known_issues: Falha ao implementar solicitação anterior (mensagem: "The AI couldn't implement your request. Please simplify or rephrase your prompt.")
Usuário relata que não está conseguindo fazer login (problema no fluxo de autenticação).

existing_features.title: Implement Internet Identity authentication and show a signed-in vs signed-out UI state across the app.

Build the main frontend flows: (1) Create Repair Request form, (2) My Tickets list, (3) Ticket Details page with status history timeline, and (4) Staff Dashboard to manage all tickets (visible only to authorized staff).

Establish a coherent visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) suitable for a professional phone repair shop. Avoid blue/purple. Apply consistently across pages using Tailwind and existing UI components (compose without modifying read-only component sources).
Update the app’s visible brand name to "HEIFIX" in the main header so the logo/title area displays "HEIFIX" instead of the current name.
Update the browser tab/document title to use "HEIFIX" (replace the current generic title in frontend/index.html).
Add a more realistic (photorealistic) hero image and a more realistic logo image to the app as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated.
Update the UI to use the new realistic images: replace the Home page hero image src and the header logo image src to point to the new generated asset filenames.
Fix the Sign In / Sign Out button behavior so it no longer incorrectly `await`s non-Promise `login()` / `clear()` calls, and so the UI remains responsive and consistent during login/logout.

Add clear, user-facing authentication error feedback anywhere the app prompts for login (header AuthButton area and AuthGate screen), using English text, including a visible error message when `loginStatus === 'loginError'` and an obvious “Try again” action.
Add basic troubleshooting hints on the AuthGate login screen for common Internet Identity issues (e.g., pop-up blockers, third-party cookies) using English user-facing text.

new_feature_requests.summary: Definir e criar um app para assistência técnica de celulares (fluxos principais e funcionalidades).

Create the core data model and persistence in the Motoko single-actor backend for repair tickets, including: ticket id, createdBy principal, customer contact fields (name, phone/email), device info (brand/model), issue description, createdAt timestamp, status (e.g., New/In Progress/Waiting for Parts/Ready/Closed), optional price estimate, optional technician notes, and a status history log.
Provide backend APIs to: create a ticket, list tickets for the current user, get ticket details, and allow an authorized technician/admin to list all tickets and update ticket status/estimate/notes.

Add a simple role/authorization mechanism: maintain an allowlist of staff principals in the backend, with backend methods to add/remove staff (restricted to a canister admin/owner) and a read method for the frontend to determine staff access.
Adicionar catálogo de serviços com preço e descrição detalhada de cada tipo de reparo.
Adicionar uma imagem mais realista ao app (ex.: banner/hero/ilustração principal) para melhorar o visual/branding do HEIFIX.
